lead_paragraph: La Salle University dropped its football program for the second time, citing a shrinking number of conference opponents for shutting down a program it revived in 1997. La Salle reinstituted football in 1997 after a 56-year absence. Two years later, the Explorers joined the 10-school Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference.
